Container.Name: ShareX Uploader
Container.Overview:
This server allows you to easily upload ShareX screenshots and videos. It includes token authentication for security and can handle various image file types by converting them to WebP format for efficient storage.
View the Git page: https://git.fascinated.cc/Fascinated/sharex-php-uploader

Config.Name: FILES_LOCATION
Config.Description: Where you want the uploaded files to be stored.

Config.Name: Host Key 1
Config.Description: The max upload size of files in megabytes. Eg: 500M

Config.Name: Host Port 1
Config.Description: The port to connect to the application on.
